CustomField.formula: IF ( AND( ( AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL( Apttus_Proposal__Approval_Stage__c , 'Approval Required')) && NOT(ISNULL(Apttus_QPConfig__ConfigurationFinalizedDate__c)) ) || ISPICKVAL( Apttus_Proposal__Approval_Stage__c , 'Approved') ), Not(APT_Document_Generation_in_Progress__c) ,NOT(ISPICKVAL( Apttus_Proposal__Approval_Stage__c , 'In Review')) ,International_Product_Exists__c == true ) , HYPERLINK("/apex/APT_ViewRatecardBatchExecute?id="&Id&'&isRCCall=true' , IMAGE("/resource/APT_Create1", "Create"),"_self"), NULL)
CustomField.label: Generate Rate Calculator
